verses.verse: All the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> who was <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> and made him <S%H4427>king<s%> in the place of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H558>Amaziah.<s%>
He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H359>Eloth,<s%> and <S%H7725>restored<s%> it to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H8337>Sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3203>Jechiliah,<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to all that his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

He set himself to <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> who had <S%H995>understanding<s%> in the <S%H7200>vision<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H3117>as<s%> long as he <S%H1875>sought<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> made him to <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>

He went <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H3898>warred<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and broke <S%H6555>down<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H2996>Jabneh,<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the country of <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and among the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> him against the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and against the <S%H6163>Arabians<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in Gur <S%H1485>Baal,<s%> and the <S%H4586>Meunim.<s%>

The <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4503>tribute<s%> to <S%H5818>Uzziah:<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> spread <S%H3212>abroad<s%> even to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for he grew <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> <S%H2388>strong.<s%>

Moreover <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4026>towers<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> at the <S%H6438>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and at the <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and at the <S%H4740>turning<s%> of the <S%H2388>wall,<s%> and fortified them.

He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4026>towers<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2672>dug<s%> out <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H953>cisterns,<s%> for he had <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> <S%H4334>also,<s%> and in the plain: and he had <S%H406>farmers<s%> and vineyard <S%H3755>keepers<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and in the fruitful <S%H3760>fields;<s%> for he <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H127>farming.<s%>

Moreover <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> had an <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H4421>fighting<s%> <S%H6213>men,<s%> who went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> by <S%H1416>bands,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of their <S%H6486>reckoning<s%> made <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H7860>officer,<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> one of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8269>captains.<s%>

The whole <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1368>households,<s%> even the mighty men of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> was two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Under their <S%H3027>hand<s%> was an <S%H2428>army,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H2428>mighty<s%> <S%H3581>power,<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> against the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

<S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H6635>them,<s%> even for all the army, <S%H4043>shields,<s%> and <S%H7420>spears,<s%> and <S%H3553>helmets,<s%> and coats of <S%H8302>mail,<s%> and <S%H7198>bows,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H7050>slinging.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H2810>engines,<s%> <S%H4284>invented<s%> by skillful <S%H2803>men,<s%> to be on the <S%H4026>towers<s%> and on the <S%H6438>battlements,<s%> with which to <S%H3384>shoot<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3318>spread<s%> far <S%H7350>abroad;<s%> for he was <S%H6381>marvelously<s%> <S%H5826>helped,<s%> <S%H3588>until<s%> he was <S%H2388>strong.<s%>

But when he was <S%H2393>strong,<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H1361>up,<s%> so that he did <S%H7843>corruptly,<s%> and he <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God;<s%> for he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H6999>incense.<s%>

<S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8084>him,<s%> and with him eighty <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who were <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men:<s%>

and they <S%H5975>resisted<s%> <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5818>him,<s%> "It isn't for you, Uzziah, to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> who are <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense.<s%> Go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> for you have <S%H4603>trespassed;<s%> neither shall it be for your <S%H3519>honor<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

Then <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> was <S%H2196>angry;<s%> and he had a <S%H4730>censer<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense;<s%> and while he was <S%H2196>angry<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> broke <S%H2224>forth<s%> in his <S%H4696>forehead<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> beside the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense.<s%>

<S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and all the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> on <S%H6879>him,<s%> and behold, he was leprous in his <S%H4696>forehead,<s%> and they thrust him <S%H926>out<s%> quickly from <S%H1765>there;<s%> yes, himself hurried also to go <S%H3318>out,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had struck <S%H5060>him.<s%>

<S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> was a <S%H6879>leper<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death,<s%> and lived <S%H3427>in<s%> a <S%H2669>separate<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> being a <S%H6879>leper;<s%> for he was cut <S%H1504>off<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was over the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz,<s%> <S%H3789>wrote.<s%>

So <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers;<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him with his <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6900>burial<s%> which belonged to the <S%H4428>kings;<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is a <S%H6879>leper.<s%>" <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
